posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Git和GitHub使用
posts.text: Git和GitHub使用1.Git本地配置查看命令 git config -l 当前配置 git config –system –list 查看系统config git config –global –list 查看当前用户（global）配置 git config –local –list 查看当前仓库配置信息 2.设置用户名与邮箱命令（全局，哪都能执行）12git config --global user.name fukkwei #名称git config --global user.email a553022977@163.com #邮箱 1~/.gitconfig #mac下全局配置文件的路径 3.设置用户名与邮箱命令（单独仓库下右键git bash执行）12git config user.name fukkwei #名称git config user.email a553022977@163.com #邮箱 1单独仓库路径/.git/config #local配置文件的路径
